termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions:
items: All members making their first deposit are eligible for this promotion.
Members need to deposit into the sports wallet to claim the bonus.
The promotion is subject to availability and applies to all mentioned sports providers.
The bonus will be credited to the sports provider wallet of your choice after a successful transfer.
Unless otherwise specified, the bonus is valid for 30 days after issuance.
Any bets that are void, tied, or canceled, or placing opposing bets on the same event, will not count toward the wagering requirement.
Members who have claimed a specific provider promotion may not transfer to that provider again during the promotion period unless they meet the wagering requirements or the promotion is canceled.
All customer offers are limited to one per person, household, and address.
This promotion cannot be used in conjunction with other BK8 promotions.
BK8 reserves the right to modify, cancel, suspend, or terminate the promotion and/or change the promotion terms without prior notice.
Participating members must accept and comply with all the above terms as well as all the terms on the BK8 website.
BK8 general terms and conditions apply.

news.title: BK8 x Manny Pacquiao
news.description: On December 1, 2023, BK8 announced that the famous Filipino boxing legend Manny Pacquiao has become the brand ambassador. Pacquiao, a 12-time world champion across eight different divisions, will help elevate BK8’s brand presence.

news.title: BK8 x Aston Villa
news.description: BK8 has signed a multi-year partnership agreement with Aston Villa Football Club, making BK8 the club’s main partner and front-of-shirt sponsor for the 2023/2024 season. Additionally, BK8 actively participates in local charity events.

news.title: BK8 x Burnley Football Club
news.description: Since 2022, BK8 has been the official Asian betting partner of Burnley Football Club. In the 2023/2024 season, BK8 expanded this partnership further by becoming the club’s official training kit partner.

news.title: BK8 x BWF
news.description: BK8 is the official betting sponsor for selected HSBC BWF World Tour events in 2024. This strategic partnership will receive extensive international exposure.

partners.type: Official Sponsor of the 2024 HSBC BWF World Tour Finals

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer:
disclaimer.content: The content displayed on this page is provided by the respective 4D providers and is for general information purposes only. While the information is presented in good faith, we make no guarantees or representations regarding the accuracy, validity, timeliness, and/or completeness of any gaming results published on this page. This site may contain links to third-party websites, advertisers, services, or content that are not owned or controlled by BK8. By accessing and using our site, users acknowledge and agree that they have read and understood the aforementioned assumption of risk. Under no circumstances shall we bear any liability for any loss or damage resulting from the use of the site or reliance on its information. We do not endorse or assume any responsibility for any such third-party sites, information, materials, products, or services. We are not responsible for monitoring transactions between users and third-party providers. All trademarks and product names are the properties of their respective holders. This site is not affiliated with any of the organizations linked or described.

howToApply.title: How to Apply
steps: Register a BK8 account. Not a member yet? [Click here to register](#).
All first-time deposit MYR account members are eligible for this promotion.
Members must transfer a minimum of MYR 50 to the designated slot provider wallet to claim the bonus.
Go to the [Transfer] page and select 'Transfer'.
Enter the amount you want to transfer from the [Main Wallet] to the designated [Provider] wallet.
Select the applicable [Promo Code] from the promo code dropdown menu.

rows: Pragmatic Play, Habanero, RedTiger, GoldenBay, CQ9, Fa Chai, Spribe, Relax Gaming, YGGDrasil, Advantplay, BBIN, Expanse Studio, V-Power, Evoplay

termsAndConditions.title: Terms & Conditions
points: This promotion applies to all slot providers except JDB, PlayStar, Nextspin, Spadegaming, YesGetRich, Joker, JiLi, Funky Games, PlayTech, Dragoon Soft, FastSpin, GamePlay, AsiaGaming, Microgaming, 918Kiss, and Mega888.
The bonus will be automatically credited to your designated provider wallet after a successful transfer.
The bonus is valid for 30 days. If the turnover requirement is not met within this period, both the bonus and winnings will be forfeited.
Bets that are void, tied, canceled, or hedged do not count towards the turnover requirement.
All non-live table games (e.g., Blackjack, Video Poker, Craps, American Roulette, Baccarat, etc.) do not count towards the turnover requirement unless otherwise stated.
Each member is allowed to apply for this promotion only once.
BK8 reserves the right to modify, cancel, or terminate this promotion at any time.
BK8 holds the final interpretation of this promotion.
All members must accept these terms and comply with BK8’s relevant rules.
[Applicable BK8 General Terms & Conditions](#)

additionalTerms.title: Additional Terms & Conditions
points: The promotion is subject to availability. It applies to all slot providers except JDB, PlayStar, Nextspin, Spadegaming, YesGetRich, Joker, JiLi, Funky Games, PlayTech, Dragoon Soft, FastSpin, GamePlay, AsiaGaming, Microgaming, 918Kiss, and Mega888.
The bonus will be credited to your chosen provider wallet after a successful transfer.

The bonus is valid for 30 days from the date of issuance unless otherwise stated. If the turnover requirement is not met within the specified time, any winnings from the bonus will be deducted from the member's account.
Any bets that result in void, tie, cancellation, or opposite outcomes will not be counted as valid turnover.

All types of non-live table games (e.g., Blackjack, Video Poker, Dice, American Roulette, Baccarat, etc.), non-slot games, and arcade games will not count towards the turnover requirement unless specifically stated.

Members who have claimed this promotion are not allowed to make a second transfer to the same provider while the promotion is active, EXCEPT for members who have met the turnover requirement or if the promotion is canceled.

All customer offers are limited to one per person, meaning one per household, address, IP address, email address, phone number, credit or debit card, e-payment account, or shared computer (e.g., school, public library, or workplace).
This promotion cannot be used in conjunction with other BK8 promotions.
BK8 reserves the right to modify, cancel, suspend, or terminate this promotion and/or change the promotion terms at any time without prior notice.
If any customer or group is found to be in violation of any clause, BK8 reserves the right to confiscate all bonuses/winnings and has the final decision.
BK8 has the sole discretion to interpret the terms of this promotion.
Participating members must accept and comply with all the above terms and all relevant rules and regulations stated on the BK8 website.
Applies to BK8 General Terms & Conditions.

VIPSection.heading: Become a BK8 VIP
VIPSection.subheading: Experience unparalleled exclusivity – special promotions, gifts, and rewards.

description.part1: As Cambodia’s most innovative and comprehensive online gaming platform, BK8 continuously strives to provide the highest quality service for its members. From game options to service standards, BK8 offers the latest and the best experiences.
description.part2: To take it a step further, BK8 has introduced an exclusive VIP program designed to give loyal members even more reasons to trust us. The BK8 VIP program consists of five tiers: Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum, and Diamond.
description.part3: The purpose of having a tiered system is to provide members with incentives for upgrading. While we encourage members to meet the VIP tier requirements and progress, our primary focus remains on member satisfaction, especially the VIP experience.

HowItWorksSection.title: How Does It Work?
HowItWorksSection.subtitle: BK8 VIP Journey
steps: Regular members will automatically be upgraded to VIP members after meeting the deposit requirements within the given timeframe.
Please allow the system up to 2 working days to verify and update your data.
Sit back, relax, and start enjoying your VIP rewards!

firstTimeUpgrade.title: Important Notice for First-Time Upgrades
description: For your safety and security, you are required to provide all necessary details as stated in the BK8 VIP upgrading policy. Our team will take up to 2 working days to review and verify the information you provide. Once completed, we will update your latest status and information in our system, and your VIP journey will officially begin!
To ensure a smooth and efficient upgrade process, please adhere to all upgrading regulations. If you need assistance, feel free to contact our

rows.benefit: Live Casino Rebate - Roulette, Blackjack, Dragon Tiger, Sic Bo

questions.question: How do I upgrade to BK8 VIP?
questions.answer:
There are multiple ways to become a BK8 VIP member:
(1) By depositing the required amount within the stated timeframe
(2) By special invitation

questions.question: Can BK8 VIP members reserve annual rewards?
questions.answer: All rewards are based on a first come, first served basis and are available while stocks last.

questions.question: How is the deposit amount calculated?
questions.answer: Deposit and turnover requirements are calculated based on the accumulated amount from the first day to the last day of the respective month.

questions.question: When can I start enjoying the benefits as a BK8 VIP member?
questions.answer: Members are entitled to enjoy special promotions and benefits starting from the first day after successfully upgrading to the VIP level.

TermsAndConditions.title: Terms & Conditions
content: BK8 reserves the right to modify, cancel, terminate, or suspend the rewards redemption or any part thereof, including applicable terms and conditions, at any time without prior notice.
Members participating in the VIP program must accept and comply with the above rules and terms, as well as all relevant rules and terms implemented by BK8 on the website.

ReferralSection.title: Spread the Word - Share the Reward
ReferralSection.subtitle: Get rewarded for referring!
description: Our referral program offers existing VIP members even more rewards for inviting friends and family to join our VIP program.

The BK8 Referral Program is designed to provide additional rewards to existing members, encouraging them to share the benefits of being a VIP member. This is our way of appreciating your loyalty and contribution to growing the BK8 VIP community. Know someone who would love to join your VIP club? Refer them now – exciting rewards and bonuses await!
For more information on how to refer, follow the steps below:
howToReferSteps: Both the referrer and referee will each receive a referral bonus of USD 300 after the referee successfully becomes a valid VIP member.
The referred member must deposit USD 15,000 within 30 days to be considered a valid VIP member.
Only first-time VIP applicants are eligible for the referral bonus.
